message: Hi, it would be cool if you would post your favourite hype music here. Nevermind music style or genre! Just post songs that you personally find motivational or which will pump you up, just like an athlete listens to something before a big game. Hit me!

I like to listen to my familiar high energy favorites to pump me up.  Songs I've heard a billion times but still love to listen to.  The Beatles "She Loves You", The Raspberries, "Go All The Way", "More Than a Feeling" (or basically side 1 of Boston's first album)
Thanks for your post. Pretty cool is music from movie trailers, like this one - http://youtu.be/LRLdhFVzqt4 - just epic.
TNT or almost anything by AC/DC
